text: The Marshall Browns were an East Texas League minor league baseball team that played in 1949 and 1950. The team was based in Marshall, Texas and was managed by Walter DeFreitas in 1949 and Bruce Ogrodowski in 1950. Ogrodowski led the squad to a league championship. Mike Blyzka, Red Jones and Bud Thomas played for the 1949 club1949 roster and Darrell Johnson, Ogrodowski and Thomas were among the 1950 players.1950 roster The team was the last pro squad to be based in Marshall, Texas.Marshall, TX baseball page ==References== Category:Baseball teams established in 1949 Category:Baseball teams disestablished in 1950 Category:1949 establishments in Texas Category:1950 disestablishments in Texas Category:Defunct baseball teams in Texas Category:Defunct minor league baseball teams
title: Marshall Browns
